full_summary:
# NPP – S4619931 - THS SA – Risk Management. Temporary Help Services Against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)

## Contract Details

* **Reference Number:** CB-9062-81985532
* **Amendment Number:** 4
* **Solicitation Number:** S4619931
* **Publication Date:** September 20, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** September 27, 2023, at 13:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** Not Specified
* **Expected Contract End Date:** Not Specified

## Scope of Work

The Department of National Defense (DND) requires Temporary Help Services under the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR). The services are required for Risk Management and are open exclusively to supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870.

## Trade Agreements

* **Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)**
* **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**

## Requirements

* The Department of National Defense (DND) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under the streams and categories listed above.
* Level of Security Requirement: Secret
* Avaitable Accommodations (if required): None

## Contracting Entity Details

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of National Defense
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K2H 8G1
* **Country:** Canada

## Requirements and Attachments
Temporary Help Services
A Request for Proposal (RFP) is issued for Temporary Help Services under the Supply Arrangement (SA) for the National Capital Region (NCR).
Redacted Materials - https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/notice/9062/S4619931 --- Method 1 - Right Fit - RFP (English).pdf

## Services Needed:
The Department of National Defense requires Temporary Help Services for their temporary staffing needs

## Important Dates
* September 20, 2023: This requirement is posted
* September 27, 2023: This requirement's tender closes at 13:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
* The updated requirement was posted on September 27, 2023
